downloadTitle: Examples to count values in an Excel spreadsheet
downloadDescription: A downloadable spreadsheet with working examples of various techniques to count in Excel

downloadFile.name: Examples to count values in an Excel spreadsheet.xlsx
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/7/c/e/7cef3f2b-91d1-42b1-bb1e-b1c46c5da725/Examples to count values in an Excel spreadsheet.xlsx

detailsSection: This is a downloadable spreadsheet with working examples of various techniques to count in Excel. Find examples of various functions, and techniques such as using AutoSum.
detailsSection_file_name: Examples to count values in an Excel spreadsheet.xlsx
systemRequirementsSection:
• The file is a Microsoft Excel document. Users who do not have Microsoft Excel can view this document through the downloadable Excel Viewer.
    •
installInstructionSection:
Paste these into the Instructions field of the Details form. You should not need to change these.
     
  1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Or, select a different language from the drop-down list, and then Choose Go.
    2.  
  2. Do one of the following:
    3.  
       
    • To start the installation immediately, choose Open or Run this program from its current location.
      •  
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, choose Save or Save this program to disk.
